gmail-send.description: Gmail Send Skill - Send emails via Gmail using App Password authentication with Markdown support

_metadata.description: MCP Configuration for Gmail Send Skill
instructions: 1. Update the 'args' path to match your installation directory
2. Ensure Python 3.7+ is installed and accessible
3. Install optional dependencies: pip install markdown
4. For Claude Desktop: Copy this configuration to Claude's MCP config file
5. Restart Claude Desktop after configuration changes
security_notes: Never store actual Gmail credentials in configuration files
App Passwords should be provided at runtime only
Use Gmail App Passwords, not regular account passwords
Enable 2-Factor Authentication before generating App Passwords
